product_name: Milltop™ Salt & Pepper Mill Set
breadcrumb: Home > Home & Furniture > Kitchenware > Kitchen Utensils
product_description: Enjoy mess-free seasoning with these Milltop™ salt and pepper mills by Joseph Joseph. Their sleek design features a unique top-grind mechanism that eliminates spills, keeping your countertop clean. You can adjust the coarseness with a simple turn of the stainless steel top.
care_instructions: Wipe clean with a damp cloth

product_name: Maternity Non Wired Nursing Bra (B-DD)
product_description: Crafted with a touch of lace for a feminine look, this seamless nursing bra from JoJo Maman Bébé offers exceptional comfort and feminine style. It's non-wired and non-padded, with a ribbed underband for light support. Adjustable flaps on the chest allow for easy feeding and a hook-and-eye fastening on the back completes this stylish design.
care_instructions: Machine wash according to instructions on care label

product_name: Flexifit™ Non Wired Full Cup Bra A-E
product_description: Feel fully supported in this full cup bra from our Body™ range, suitable for low impact sport activity. Front Zip style for easier dressing. Free from wires and non padding, it gives a natural-looking shape under clothes. Breathable fabric features stretchy Flexifit™ technology for all-day comfort.
material_composition: Composition 57% polyester, 25% polyamide and 18% elastane (exclusive of trimmings)
care_instructions: Wash at 40°C Do not bleach Tumble dry medium temperature Do not iron Do not dry clean

product_name: LaceWear Wired Plunge Bra (F-H)
product_description:
Intricate floral-inspired stretch lace paired with smooth satin detailing lends a pretty look to this bra from Rosie Exclusively for M&S. This plunge style creates a contoured silhouette, with a lower neckline and padded cups to enhance your natural shape. Underwiring provides extra support. The design is complete with contemporary branded logo elastic and exclusively designed signature rose gold hardware. 
 
 Rosie: contemporary, feminine silhouettes crafted from luxurious fabrics with intricate detailing.
care_instructions: Wash at 40°C Do not bleach Do not tumble dry Do not iron Do not dry clean

product_name: Spirit Restored Yoga Bra
product_description: The Spirit Restored yoga bra by Sweaty Betty is designed to keep you comfortable through every pose. It's made in a smooth, seamless style from a super-soft fabric with four-way stretch that moves with you. The ribbed underband offers gentle support without wiring, while removable padding allows you to wear the bra your way. This piece features slim straps for a flattering finish.
material_composition: Composition 72% polyamide fulgar, 20% polyamide and 8% elastane
care_instructions: Machine wash according to instructions on care label

product_name: Trousseau Embroidery Wired Multiway Bra (A-E)
product_description:
Perfect for your special day, the Trousseau bra from Rosie Exclusively for M&S combines beautiful design with exceptional comfort. This wired and padded longline bra offers support and shaping, with multiway straps for versatile styling. Delicate Swiss-designed gold embroidery, pretty boning and spot-textured mesh create a truly luxurious look. It also features satin trims and exclusively designed signature rose gold hardware.
 
 Rosie: contemporary, feminine silhouettes crafted from luxurious fabrics with intricate detailing.
material_composition: Composition 58% polyester, 37% polyamide, 4% elastane and 1% metallised fibres (exclusive of trimmings)
care_instructions: Wash at 40°C Do not bleach Do not tumble dry Do not iron Do not dry clean

product_name: Dream Strappy Nursing Chemise
product_description: Make middle-of-the-night feeds easier with this nursing chemise from Hotmilk. This short, strappy style is designed with added stretch and has non-wired cups to avoid pressure on milk ducts. Every seam is carefully placed to avoid irritation, and ensure total comfort. Simply twist the subtle nursing clips when you're ready to feed. Mesh detailing along the neckline and underbust adds a feminine finish.
care_instructions: Machine wash according to instructions on care label

product_name: Sheer Floral V-Neck Kaftan Dress
product_description: Mix up your poolside look with this kaftan from Miraclesuit. It's cut in a flowing relaxed fit, with lace-up tassel detailing at the feminine v-neckline. The sheer fabric is printed with a striking botanical motif and embellished with metallic threadwork. The hemline sits at a flattering knee length.
care_instructions: Hand wash only Do not bleach Do not tumble dry Iron at medium temperature Gentle professional dry clean

product_name: Jersey Lace Detail Long Nightdress
product_description: This Cyberjammies nightdress is crafted from supersoft modal-rich jersey for ultimate comfort. It's designed in an easy, regular fit, with neat fabric-covered buttons on the chest. Lace detailing on the cap sleeves and V-neck adds a romantic feel.
care_instructions: Machine wash according to instructions on care label

product_name: Perfect Fit High Waisted Leggings
product_description: These perfect-fit Wolford leggings are made from a soft modal-blend jersey that feels smooth against your skin. They're cut to a flattering slim fit, with a stretchy high-rise waist to ensure a comfortable feel. The ankle grazer length adds a cool finish.
care_instructions: Do not wash Do not bleach Do not tumble dry Do not iron Gentle professional dry clean

product_name: Silk & Lace Wired Balcony Bra F-H
product_description: Bring some understated elegance to your lingerie collection with this luxurious silk-blend bra by Rosie Exclusively for M&S. The wired balcony style has a wider neckline and non-padded cups that are especially flattering for fuller busts. French-designed lace trims and exclusively designed signature rose gold hardware complete the sophisticated look. Rosie Silk: vibrant silk styles decorated with feminine florals and vintage-inspired lace.
material_composition: Composition 36% silk, 35% polyamide, 15% elastane and 14% polyester (exclusive of trimmings)
care_instructions: Wash at 40°C Do not bleach Do not tumble dry Do not iron Do not dry clean

product_name: Beach Waves Wired Scoop Neck Bikini Top D-H
product_description: The Beach Waves bikini top from Fantasie is crafted from softly textured fabric for subtle detailing. It's made in a bold scoop neck style with underwired cups that are unpadded for a natural look. Gentle gathers at the underband create extra shaping, while a concealed side sling and powernet-lined wings give a flattering, forward-facing profile. At the centre front, a beaded cord adds a fun finishing touch.
care_instructions: Hand wash only Do not bleach Do not tumble dry Iron at medium temperature Gentle professional dry clean

product_name: Envy Wired Full Cup Bra D-K
product_description: The Envy bra by Panache provides just the right amount of coverage and support for fuller busts. Its wired, four-piece cups are laminated at the bottom for a firmer, supportive feel, while the top is crafted from delicate stretch lace that sits smooth against the skin. Side slings create forward projection for a flattering shape. Fully adjustable straps complete the design.
care_instructions: Hand wash only Do not bleach Do not tumble dry Iron at medium temperature Gentle professional dry clean

product_name: Crepe Tab Detail Wide Leg Trousers
product_description:
Perfect for dressier occasions, these crepe trousers have an elegant silhouette. Flattering design with a wide leg and high waist. Belt loops, front darts and pressed creases create a smart tailored look. Practical touches include side pockets and added stretch in the fabric. Finished on the back with a stylish buckle tab detail at the waist and two mock welt pockets.
 M&S Collection: easy-to-wear wardrobe staples that combine classic and contemporary styles.
care_instructions: Wash at 40°C delicate Do not bleach Do not tumble dry Iron at low temperature Professional dry clean

product_name: Button Detail Mini Dress
product_description: Button Detail Mini Dress
care_instructions: Wash at 40°C delicate Do not bleach Do not tumble dry Iron at low temperature Do not dry clean

product_name: Floral V-Neck Lace Detail Midaxi Slip Dress
product_description:
A timeless floral print and delicate lace detailing add a feminine feel to this slip dress. It's designed in a regular fit, with a flattering v-shaped neckline and airy short sleeves. The hem falls to a swishy midaxi length for a graceful finish.
 
 M&S Collection: easy-to-wear wardrobe staples that combine classic and contemporary styles.
material_composition: Composition 100% polyester (exclusive of trimmings), Lace trim - 100% polyamide
care_instructions: Wash at 30°C Do not bleach Do not tumble dry Iron at low temperature Professional dry clean

product_name: Body Soft™ Wired Full Cup T-Shirt Bra A-E
product_description: With its sueded fabric and lace detailing, this Body Soft™ t-shirt bra combines comfort with femininity. The padded cups are underwired for extra support and made with an invisible edge for a smooth silhouette under clothes. A stretchy soft-touch hook and eye closure improves the fit and minimises irritation to the skin. M&S Collection: versatile styles in modern shapes with unique and playful details.
material_composition: Composition 68% polyamide, 19% polyester and 13% elastane (exclusive of trimmings)
care_instructions: Wash at 40°C Do not bleach Do not tumble dry Do not iron Do not dry clean
